slides.title: AI Readiness Assessment
slides.subtitle: Helping enterprises prepare for AI adoption

slides.title: Why AI Readiness Matters
slides.body:
Organizations that invest in AI readiness see 3x faster time-to-value.

Without proper preparation, 85% of AI initiatives fail to reach production.

slides.title: Assessment Framework
slides.left_body:
Data infrastructure
ML pipeline maturity
Compute & tooling
Security posture
slides.right_body:
Talent & skills gap
Change management
Governance framework
Budget alignment

slides.text:
The best time to prepare for AI was yesterday.
The second best time is now.

slides.title: Case Study: Fortune 500 Biotech
slides.challenge: Scattered ML workflows across 12 teams with no shared infrastructure.
slides.solution: OpenTeams deployed Nebari as a unified ML platform with SSO and RBAC.
slides.results: 70% reduction in experiment-to-production time. $2.4M annual savings.
